tool_name: Top rated restaurants by city name
tool_description: get top rated restaurants by city name
title: Top rated restaurants by city name

api_list.name: get top 10 restaurants
api_list.description: API returns top 10 restaurants by google maps rating
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top-rated-restaurants-by-city-name.p.rapidapi.com/restaurants"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-rated-restaurants-by-city-name.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
